prompt.value: Chief Complaint

description.value: Describe each instance of mild traumatic brain injury with symptomatology in chronological order.

prompt.value: Loss of consciousness?
If loss of consciousness occurred (= Yes), record duration
Alteration in consciousness?
If alteration of consciousness occurred (= Yes), record duration
Alteration in mental state?
If alteration of mental state occurred (= Yes), record duration
If amnesia occurred (= Yes), record duration
Best Glasgow Coma Score in First 24 Hours
Treatment (Including Any Surgery and/or Rehabilitation Therapy)
Additional Details
Additional Mild Traumatic Brain Injury Event(s)?
Persistent Symptoms
Additional details for any of the above Persistant Symptoms
Do Symptoms Impact Function?
Obtain Details (= Yes)
Neuropsychological Testing Done?
If neuropsychological testing done (= Yes), record type of test
If neuropsychological testing done (= Yes), record date
If neuropsychological testing done (= Yes), record additional details
Additional Neuropsychological Testing?
Head Computed Tomography (CT)?
If patient had head CT, record date
If patient had head CT, record interpretation

Check all that apply
Additional details for any of the above Comorbidities

Did the veteran serve in Operation Iraqi Freedom (OIF) or in Operation Enduring Freedom (OEF), either on the ground, in nearby coastal waters, or in the air above, after September 11, 2001? (Consider most recent OIF/OEF deployment only.)
If patient was deployed in either OIF or OEF, provide deployment history
Spouse/Caregiver in the home?
If patient has spouse and/or caregiver in the home, provide details
Children in the home?
If patient has children in the home, provide details
If patient is homeless, provide details
Other Social, Living Situation, or Support Instability?
If patient has other social, living situation or support instability, provide details
Currently Employed?
If patient is currently employed, provide details
Currently Attending School?
If patient is currently attending school, provide details

prompt.value: If patient has earned a degree, provide relevant details (e.g. school, focus subject, etc.)
Caffeine Use
If patient uses caffeine, provide relevant details (cups per day, etc.
Alcohol Use
If patient uses alcohol, provide relevant details (type, drinks per day, etc.
Tobacco Use
If patient uses tobacco, provide relevant details (cigarettes vs cigars vs pipe vs oral, amount per day, duration of use etc.
Other Substance Use
If patient uses other substances, provide relevant details (substance type, amount per day, duration of use, adverse reactions, overdoses, etc.
